SEARCH
Package org.main.unimapapi.services

Class NewsService

java.lang.Object
org.main.unimapapi.services.NewsService
@Service public class NewsService extends Object
Service for managing news entries stored in the news table.

Provides methods for creating, updating, reading and deleting news.

      public List<News_dto> getAllNews()

      list of News_dto objects

      Retrieves a specific news entry by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the news
      Returns:
      News_dto or null if not found

    • getLatestNews

      public List<News_dto> getLatestNews(int count)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      list of News_dto

    • saveNews

      @Transactional public News_dto saveNews(News_dto news)
      Saves or updates a news entry.
      Parameters:
      news - the news to save
      Returns:
      the saved News_dto (without updated ID if it was inserted)

    • existsById

      public boolean existsById(Long id)
      Checks whether a news entry exists with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the news ID to check
      Returns:
      true if the entry exists, otherwise false

      @Transactional public void deleteNewsById(Long id)

      Parameters:
